name: ComBOmb (Ludum Dare 46)
description:
A game about keeping a combo alive

  • Left & Right/A & D - Move
  • Up/W/Space - Jump
  • Left Click - Slash n' Dash

You can only dash once in the air. Jumping, however, will reset your dash. Hitting a balloon will reset both your dash and jump.

Hit as many balloons as you can before the bomb explodes!
